name: Native American 'Style' Wood Flute, Key of G
description:
Aromatic cedar - key of G 
5 hole

All my flutes are hand made - not mass produced. Not turned on a lathe, but shaped with shavers and by hand sanding. Each flute becomes a unique instrument with it's own voice. It takes many hours to complete each one and great care is taken in the construction of each.

This flutes is tuned to the pentatonic scale. Key of G

Sounds beautiful! Looks great too!

Protected with 3 coats of non-toxic finish inside and out!

They look like pieces of art!

They are easy to play!

They will give you many hours of enjoyment.

Made from aromatic cedar wood. Measures approximately 25 inches long

Please note: These are Native American 'Style' Flutes and were NOT made by a registered member of a Native American Tribe. Made with the deepest respect for the Native American culture.

Shipped by priority mail. Satisfaction guaranteed - if not happy with it, return for a refund - or a different flute ;-)

name: American Made Fleece Bags for Wood Flutes
description: American made (in Minnesota) Fleece Bags for Wood flutes or pipes. Will hold a 26" long flute. Bags are approx. 3.5 x 28 inches with beaded drawstring top.
